CHAT.comment: Time is 20:48. Video tape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio tape

MOT and Chi don't spend too much time in conversation during this activity , which takes place on the floor. Mot and Chi play separately most of the time , but they do play together at intervals throughout the activity. Mot and Chi direct the activities equally. Mot teases Chi in play , by taking one of his pieces for example , and Chi generally responds without aggression. There is a lot of laughing. There is some talk of how some things stick and others don't , but no discussion of why this happens. EXP is removed from the activity but laughs when something interesting happens and offers some positive reinforcement to Chi.

u.a: EXP introduces activity to participants; then EXP and Mot set up room for videotaping while Chi plays with magnets on his own; Sis asks if she can play too , but Mot says no
video tape starts here
MOT is stacking silver men on the black base and Chi is picking washers , nuts , and magnets up with the yellow wand
Chi had removed some silver men from Mot's stack
stacks the silver men
Chi tries to remove silver men with wand; Mot prevents Chi from doing so
stacks silver men on top of one another , head to feet
begins lining up nuts and washers on the floor
restacks silver men side to side
bef Mot took away one of Chi's washers with the purple star
Chi takes some of Mot's pieces with the yellow wand
MOT is taking Chi's pieces with the purple star
picks up all of Chi's pieces with one sweep of the black base magnet
takes back a few washers and nuts from Mot using yellow wand
reaches out for washers and nuts on Chi's yellow wand and takes back some of them
whispered
has put the silver men , washers , and nuts together on the black base as if it were a sculpture
whispered
MOT's sculpture has just fell down
MOT and Chi remove all objects from the black base
SIS
SIS moved the audio tape and is holding it closer to the activity
softly
during the pause Chi tried to add something which looks like a small pink rectangle to the tower and it fell
places orange plastic monster on black base which Chi was using
leans turtle against black base
picks up turtle
whispered mumble
holding up and inspecting turtle
places the monster and turtle on the black base
places two silver men on the black base , then puts three more on top of them
whispered
MOT points out washer to Chi and Chi puts it on the hands of the two top men , making a platform between the two
whispered
completes his pyramid with the monster on top of the washer platform
turns the pyramid around slowly
slides his pyramid over to Mot and takes pyramid apart
MOT placed pink circle and yellow triangle on black base and Chi didn't want them there
middle refers to the middle of the black base
during pause Mot is gathering up objects from the floor with the yellow wand and Chi is arranging silver men on the platform in what looks like a circle around the edge of the magnetic base
MOT has started helping Chi set up the silver men
puts the silver men close enough for their hands to touch
silver man has trouble standing upright , keeps falling onto the black base
sing-song voice
begins removing silver men from base
strange voice
MOT is pushing the red ball off the base with one of the silver men while Chi is trying to keep the ball on the base
grabs yellow magnetic wand and starts trying to pick up the silver men
picks up black base with the yellow wand and holds it up in the air
it is unclear who is growling; from the video tape , it doesn't seem to be Mot or Chi
Chi is working with black base , nuts , and washers
Chi and Mot are both placing pieces on the black base
removes objects from black base with Mot's help
removes a flat silver circle from the top of the black base
reaches over to pick up silver circle
looks at silver circle and touches it with a silver stick
puts down silver circle and silver stick
silver man

Chi is trying to make a silver man stand up on the black base , but it keeps falling flat; Mot then puts the flat silver circle back on the black base , enabling Chi to successfully stand up the silver man on the base
during pause , MOT and Chi continue putting silver men onto the black base
places the silver stick on top of one of the silver men
Chi is building a tower of silver men and seems to be saying that he wants them , especially the top silver man , to stay in position
places a silver stick on the hands of a silver man
places third silver man on top of silver man tower
whispered
moves orange monster toward Chi's tower
whispered
places orange monster on the black base
places orange monster on top of Chi's silver man tower and the tower collapses
